info.name: shortest quadtree (170ch)
info.description:
simplied variant of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/Xt3fDB[/url]
golfed variant of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/lljSDy[/url]

renderpass.code:
// simplied variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/Xt3fDB
// golfed variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/lljSDy

#define mainImage(O,u)                               \
                                                     \
    vec2 U =  u/iResolution.y, f,                    \
         P = .5+.5* vec2(cos(iTime),sin(iTime*.7));  \
    for ( float r = 1.; r > .01; r /= 2. )           \
         length(P-r) - .2 < 1.4*r                    \
          ?   U -= f = step(r,U)*r,                  \
        	  P -= f,                                \
        	  O.rg += f/r*.2                         \
          : f
renderpass.name: Image
